data.title: Hours + Location
data.meta_description: Death & Co is one of the world's leading cocktail bars with four locations in New York, Denver, Los Angeles, and Washington, D.C.
data.text:
433 EAST 6TH STREET (B/W 1ST & A),

NEW YORK, NY 10009

Sunday - Wednesday: 6pm - 1am

Thursday - Saturday: 6pm - 2am

We offer limited reservations through Tock and primarily operate on a first come, first served basis with seats available for walk-ins. We can accommodate parties of up to 8 guests.

No standing room is offered. Please note, all experiences are for a maximum visit of 2 hours.

About Us

Opened on New Year’s Eve 2006/07 in Manhattan’s East Village, Death & Co quickly became a cocktail institution, owed greatly to its team of groundbreaking bartenders. In 2010, Death & Co won Best American Cocktail Bar and World’s Best Cocktail Menu at Tales of the Cocktail Spirited Awards.

Having since published the influential books Modern Classic Cocktails, Cocktail Codex, and Welcome Home, as well as opening new D&C locations nationwide, Death & Co continues to create unforgettable experiences and connect people through cocktail-anchored hospitality.
